B C D E F G I J M N O P R S T V Z

J

jacobiSymbol(BigInteger, BigInteger) - Static method in class com.ronhorner.primes.PrimeUtils
Computes the Jacobi Symbol of two integers a and n
Inputs : a : the numerator for the Jacobi Symbol; n : the odd denominator for the Jacobi Symbol Output : -1, 0 or 1 Jacobi(a,n) { j := 1 while (a not 0) do { while (a even) do { a := a/2 if (n = 3 (mod 8) or n = 5 (mod 8)) then j := -j } interchange(a,n) if (a = 3 (mod 4) and n = 3 (mod 4)) then j := -j a := a mod n } if (n = 1) then return (j) else return(0) }
